simj

Class SimLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • simj.SimLogger

  • public class SimLogger
extends Object
    This singleton class implements a logging service.
    Author:
    Patrik Fuhrer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SimLogger getUniqueInstance()
      Returns the unique instance of this singleton class.
      static Logger getUniqueLogger()
      Returns the unique logger managed by this class.
      void set(boolean pFineLogging)
      Enables or disables the detailed logging for the current simulation.

    • Method Detail

      • getUniqueInstance

        public static SimLogger getUniqueInstance()
        Returns the unique instance of this singleton class.
        Returns:
        The unique instance of this singleton class.

      • getUniqueLogger

        public static Logger getUniqueLogger()
        Returns the unique logger managed by this class.
        Returns:
        The unique instance of the logger.

      • set

        public void set(boolean pFineLogging)
        Enables or disables the detailed logging for the current simulation. This method is invoked at the initialization of each simulation.
        Parameters:
        pFineLogging - A boolean indicating if detailed logging is enabled or no. If false there are just the global scan messages displayed to the console. If true the global scan messages are displayed to the console, logged to a simple log file, and detailed messages are logged to a detailed log file.
